text: Jean-Claude Guibal (13 January 1941 - 25 October 2021) was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the 4th constituency of the Alpes-Maritimes department. He was a member of The Republicans. In 1989, he became Mayor of Menton. Guibal was married to Colette Giudicelli until her death. He died on 25 October 2021 in Menton from a heart attack, aged 80.Le maire de Menton Jean-Claude Guibal est mort ce lundi matin Jean-Claude Guibal is a former student of HEC Paris, Sciences Po and ENA.Jean- Claude Guibal : une vie dédiée à la ville de Menton ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Jean-Claude Guibal
